movie.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
movie.title_english: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
movie.title_long: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again (2018)
movie.description_intro: Discover Donna's (Meryl Streep, Lily James) young life, experiencing the fun she had with the three possible dads of Sophie (Amanda Seyfriend). As she reflects on her mom's journey, Sophie finds herself to be more like her mother than she ever even realized.
movie.description_full: Discover Donna's (Meryl Streep, Lily James) young life, experiencing the fun she had with the three possible dads of Sophie (Amanda Seyfriend). As she reflects on her mom's journey, Sophie finds herself to be more like her mother than she ever even realized.

movies.title: Fun Mom Dinner
movies.summary: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."
movies.description_full: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."
movies.synopsis: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."

movies.title: Woman of the Year
movies.summary: Tess and Sam work on the same newspaper and don't like each other very much. At least the first time, because they eventually fall in love and get married. But Tess is a very active woman and one of the most famous feminists in the country; she is even elected as "the woman of the year." Being busy all the time, she forgets how to really be a woman and Sam begins to feel neglected.

movies.title: De l'autre côté du lit
movies.summary: Ariane and Hugo decide to exchange the lives they lead to escape from their routine, which after ten years of marriage, gives them the feeling of being hamsters in a wheel. She suddenly finds herself at the head of a construction equipment rental company and he tries to take the role of a house calling jewelry salesman...But is life really better when you live it on the other side of the bed?

movies.title: Paint Your Wagon
movies.summary: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife, hijacking a stage, kidnaping six prostitutes, and turning their mining camp into a boomtown. Along the way there is plenty of drinking, gambling, and singing. They even find time to do some creative gold mining.
